spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 科鲁贡的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。

trait.name: Charge
entries: 如果Cornugon至少向一个目标直线移动15英尺，然后用血肉攻击击中它，攻击会对目标造成额外的9（（%0%））的伤害。如果目标是一个生物，它必须成功地完成一个{@dc 19}的蓄力动作，或者被推到10英尺以外并被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍魔鬼的暗视。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 科鲁贡对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 科鲁贡可以进行三次近战攻击：一次是咬人，两次是用爪子。或者，它可以进行一次爪子攻击并施放一次法术。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7})砍击伤害。

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: 科鲁贡会神奇地将它和它所穿戴和携带的任何装备一起传送到它能看到的无人空间，最远可达120英尺。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 狗仔队的法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何材料成分。

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: 在它的第一个回合中，Dogai在对任何还没有进入回合的生物进行攻击时具有优势。狗仔队对被惊动的生物的任何一击都是关键一击。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍魔鬼的暗视。

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果狗仔受到的效果允许它做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，如果蓄力动作成功，狗仔就不会受到伤害，如果失败，就只会受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Shadow Form
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，Dogai可以变成一个模糊的纯影子的形状。在这种形态下，狗仔不能攻击或施法，在昏暗的光线或黑暗中是{@condition invisible}，可以在1英寸宽的狭窄空间内移动而不被挤压。在阴影状态下，对Dogai的攻击是以劣势进行的。狗仔队可以使用一个额外的动作来结束这个效果。

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: 在昏暗的光线或黑暗中，狗仔队可以采取{@action Hide}的行动作为额外行动。

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: 当狗仔队用武器攻击击中目标并在攻击卷上有优势时，或者当目标在狗仔队的盟友5英尺范围内不是{@condition incapacitated}且狗仔队在攻击卷上没有劣势时，会造成额外的10（{@damage 3d6}）伤害。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，Dogai的救赎动作具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 狗仔队可以进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shadow Step
entries: 狗仔会神奇地传送到它能看到的昏暗光线或黑暗的无人空间中，最远可达30英尺。在传送之前或之后，它可以进行一次近战攻击。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil Spines
entries: 在5英尺范围内接触到胃结石或用近身攻击击中它的生物会被刺伤，并受到7（（%0%））的穿刺伤害，并且必须成功进行（%1%）宪法救赎，否则会变成（%2%）。当{@condition poisoned}时，该生物是{@condition paralyzed}。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，成功后结束对其自身的影响。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍胃肠动物的黑暗视觉。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 胃膜炎患者在面对法术和其他魔法效果的时候，有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 胃肠杆菌进行两次脊柱攻击或两次酸球攻击。它可以用吞食来代替其中的一次攻击。

action.name: Spine
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})的穿刺伤害，目标必须在{@dc 17}宪法救赎中成功，否则会变成{@condition poisoned}。当{@condition poisoned}时，该生物是{@condition paralyzed}。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自身的影响。

action.name: Acid Glob
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8}击中，范围60英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d6})酸液伤害，如果目标是生物，必须成功进行{@dc 17}力量投掷，否则会被{@condition restrained}。当{@condition restrained}时，生物在胃膜炎的每个回合开始时受到7({@damage 2d6})的酸伤害。作为一个动作，{@condition restrained}生物可以进行{@dc 17}力量检查，成功后可以从酸球中逃脱。如果酸球被摧毁，则该效果结束。胃酸球有10点攻击力，5点命中率，对酸、毒和精神伤害有免疫力。胃肠道对其酸球有免疫力。

action.name: Swallow
entries: 胃泡虫吞下一个{@condition incapacitated}大型或小型生物。被吞噬的生物是{@condition blinded}和{@condition restrained}，它对胃肠杆菌以外的攻击和其他效果有完全的掩护，并且在胃肠杆菌的每个回合开始时受到10({@damage 3d6})的酸性伤害。
如果gastrobolus在一个回合内受到20次以上的伤害，gastrobolus必须在该回合结束时成功地进行一次{@dc 16}宪法救赎，或者反刍所有被吞的生物，这些生物会在gastrobolus的5英尺内的空间里掉落{@condition prone}。如果gastrobolus死亡，被吞食的生物不再被它影响（%2%），并且可以通过使用5英尺的移动距离，从尸体上逃脱（%3%）。

action.name: Teleport
entries: 胃肠球菌会神奇地将它和它所穿戴和携带的任何设备一起传送到它能看到的无人空间，最远可达60英尺。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 帕里昂的法术能力是 "魅力"（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍魔鬼的暗视。

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: 在依靠嗅觉的智慧（（%0%））检查中，paeliryon具有优势。

trait.name: Intoxicating Scent
entries: 任何在paeliryon的10英尺范围内开始其回合并能闻到paeliryon的生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 20}宪法救赎，否则会被{@condition poisoned}，直到其下一回合开始。直到这个毒药结束，目标是（%2%）。如果救赎成功，该生物将在24小时内对paeliryon的毒气免疫。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，paeliryon的救赎动作具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 帕里昂使用贝利特尔。然后它进行了三次攻击：一次用咬，两次用爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})坏死伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14({@damage 2d6 + 7})的砍击伤害加上7({@damage 2d6})的坏死伤害，如果目标是生物，它必须做一个{@dc 20}的魅力拯救动作，否则会被诅咒为魔法畸形。在变形期间，该生物的速度减半，在能力检查、蓄力和基于力量或灵巧的攻击方面处于劣势。
被转化的生物可以在完成长时间的休息时重复这个蓄力动作，如果成功则结束效果。

action.name: Belittle
entries: paeliryon会投掷侮辱性的语言，以打击敌人的不安全感。每个在paeliryon 60英尺范围内并能听到它的生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 18}智慧救赎，否则会变得{@condition frightened}，持续1分钟。如果目标失败5次或更多，它将被激怒1分钟。在被激怒时，该生物必须使用它的行动，以它的速度向paeliryon移动，如果它在范围内，对它进行一次近战武器攻击。否则，它必须使用它的（2%）行动，向paeliryon的5英尺范围内的空间移动。一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对它的影响。如果一个生物的救赎成功或效果结束，该生物将在接下来的24小时内免疫于paeliryon的伤害。

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: 帕里昂会神奇地传送，连同它所穿戴和携带的任何装备，最远可传送到它能看到的无人空间。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 激情魔鬼的法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。

trait.name: Aura of Desire
entries: 在激情魔鬼10英尺范围内的生物，在对其进行的拯救动作中处于劣势（%0%）。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍魔鬼的暗视。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 激情魔鬼在面对法术和其他魔法效果的时候，有优势。

action.name: Fiery Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}21 ({@damage 6d6})火焰伤害，如果目标是生物，它必须成功进行{@dc 17}智慧救赎。如果救赎失败，目标会被{@condition charmed}，直到回合结束，并且必须使用它的反应来移动到它的一半速度，并对激情魔鬼选择的生物进行一次武器攻击。如果救赎成功，该生物将在24小时内免疫于激情之触的魅惑效果。

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: 激情魔鬼会神奇地将它和它所穿戴和携带的任何设备一起传送到它能看到的无人空间，最远可达120英尺。

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm
entries: 当一个在激情魔鬼60英尺范围内的生物对它进行攻击，而另一个生物在攻击范围内，攻击者必须做一个{@dc 17}的智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，攻击者会被{@condition charmed}，直到回合结束，并且必须以离它最近的生物为目标，不包括激情魔王和它自己。如果有多个生物离它最近，攻击者会选择哪一个作为目标。如果蓄力成功，攻击者将在24小时内对激情魔鬼的本能魅力免疫。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 雷马农的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。

trait.name: Insidious Aura
entries: 在雷马农20英尺范围内开始行动的生物必须成功进行智慧救赎，除非雷马农是{@dc 18}。如果救赎失败，该生物必须使用它的行动，以它的速度移动，并对雷马农选择的、雷马农能看到的生物进行近战武器攻击。如果一个生物的救赎成功，该生物在接下来的24小时内对雷马农的阴森光环免疫。建筑物、魔鬼和不死生物对这个效果免疫。雷马农可以用一个额外的动作来激活这个光环，也可以关闭。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍魔鬼的暗视。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 雷马农对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

action.name: Hellfire Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})火力伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})坏死伤害。如果这个伤害将目标降低到0命中率，它将被瓦解。被瓦解的生物和它所穿戴和携带的一切，除了魔法物品，都会变成一堆细小的灰烬和渣滓。该生物只能通过真正的复活或愿望法术来恢复生命。

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: 雷马农会神奇地将它和它所穿戴和携带的任何设备一起传送到它能看到的无人的空间，最远可达120英尺。

action.name: Summon Bearded Devils (1/Day)
entries: 雷马农用魔法召唤出一个{@dice 1d3}长胡子的魔鬼。魔鬼出现在雷马农60英尺范围内无人的空间，并作为雷马农的盟友。魔鬼会一直呆在那里，直到雷马农死亡，或者直到它以行动方式将其解散。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: xerflstyx的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击击中（%1%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: xerflstyx可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: 神奇的黑暗并不妨碍魔鬼的暗视。

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: 在xerflstyx的20英尺范围内的生物必须成功地进行智慧拯救，除非xerflstyx是（%1%）。拯救失败后，该生物会被（%2%），持续1分钟。当{@condition frightened}这样做的时候，生物必须采取{@action Dash}的行动，在它的每个回合中通过最安全的路线离开Xerflstyx，除非没有地方可以移动，在这种情况下它不需要采取冲刺行动。如果该生物在它不能看到Xerflstyx的地方结束它的回合，该生物可以重复这个蓄力动作。如果一个生物的蓄力动作成功，该生物在接下来的24小时内将免疫于Xerflstyx的恐惧光环。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: xerflstyx在面对法术和其他魔法效果时，在蓄力攻击方面有优势。

trait.name: Spell Steal
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，Xerflstyx可以偷取它正在抓捕的生物所准备的一个法术。目标必须做一个{@dc 17}智慧救赎动作，否则就会失去一个法术（随机选择），就像该生物已经施展了它一样。被盗的咒语会被加入到xerflstyx的咒语列表中，它可以在1/天内施放。24小时后，xerflstyx将失去所有通过这种方式获得的法术。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: xerflstyx进行三次攻击：两次用它的大剑，一次用它的尾巴。

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6})砍击伤害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6})重击伤害，目标必须做一个{@dc 16}强度的蓄力动作。拯救失败时，目标会被{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 16})，并被拉到离xerflstyx 5英尺以内的空间。当{@condition grappled}这样做的时候，目标是{@condition restrained}，在xerflstyx的每个回合开始时受到18({@damage 4d8})的坏死伤害，并且xerflstyx不能对其他目标使用尾巴攻击。

action.name: Blood Breath (Recharge after a Long Rest)
entries: xerflstyx在60英尺的范围内呼出滚烫的血液。该区域内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 19}宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到22({@damage 5d8})的火焰伤害和22({@damage 5d8})的尸毒伤害，如果救赎成功，则受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
entries: xerflstyx会神奇地传送，连同它所穿戴和携带的任何装备，最多可以传送到120英尺的它所看到的无人的空间。

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 阿斯莫德的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），法术攻击命中率（%1%））。他可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 阿斯莫德是一个20级的施法者。他的法术能力是智慧（法术救赎（%0%），法术攻击命中率（%1%）），他只需要语言成分来施法。他准备了以下的牧师法术。

trait.name: Aura of Submission
entries: 当阿斯莫德挥舞着红宝石棒时，在阿斯莫德20英尺范围内的生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 27}智慧救赎，除非阿斯莫德是{@condition incapacitated}。如果救赎失败，该生物必须在阿斯莫德面前下跪和鞠躬，直到其下一回合开始。在这种跪拜和鞠躬结束之前，目标不能采取任何行动或反应，其速度为0且不能增加。如果生物的救赎动作成功，该生物在接下来的24小时内对阿斯莫德的服从光环免疫。

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: 当阿斯摩德的命中率降至0或死亡时，他的身体会被摧毁，但他的精华会回到他在九层地狱最底层的内苏斯的领域，并在一段时间内无法形成实体。

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: 除非他希望受到影响，否则阿斯莫德对6级或以下的法术是免疫的。他对所有其他的法术和魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: 如果阿斯莫德的救赎失败，他可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 阿斯莫德的武器攻击是神奇的。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果阿斯莫德至少有1点生命值，他在他的回合开始时恢复30点生命值。

trait.name: Swift Caster
entries: 在挥舞红宝石棒时，阿斯莫德可以使用一个额外的动作来施放一个施法时间为一个动作的法术。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿斯莫德用他的红宝石棒攻击两次，并使用他的寒意凝视。

action.name: Ruby Rod (+5 Mace)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 20}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}20 ({@damage 2d8 + 11})重击伤害加上18 ({@damage 4d8})坏死伤害。如果目标是生物，它必须做一个{@dc 27}智慧救赎动作。如果拯救失败，该生物必须在阿斯莫德面前下跪和鞠躬，直到下一回合开始。在这种跪拜和鞠躬结束之前，目标不能采取任何行动或反应，其速度为0且不能增加，除非阿斯莫德强迫它这样做（见下面的命令顺从）。

action.name: Chill Gaze
entries: 阿斯莫德将他的魔法目光转向他能看到的120英尺内的一个生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 24}的宪法救赎中成功。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到31({@damage 6d6 + 10})的寒冷伤害，不能使用反应，其速度减半，并且在其回合内不能进行一次以上的攻击。此外，该生物在其回合中可以使用一个行动或一个额外行动，但不能同时使用。这些效果持续1分钟。该生物可以在其每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果蓄力成功则结束对其自身的影响。拯救成功时，目标会受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Reverie of Nessus (1/Day)
entries: 在挥舞红宝石棒时，阿斯莫德会以阿斯莫德为中心，神奇地创造一个5英尺半径的球形力墙，持续到阿斯莫德下一个回合的开始。这个力墙同时具有力墙和（%0%）法术的功能。在这个范围内，阿斯莫德可以像在时间停止咒语下一样运作。此外，阿斯莫德会自动清除任何不需要的物理和魔法条件、魔法或效果、疾病和弊病（包括失去的身体部位）。此外，阿斯莫德重新获得所有的命中率，并获得完成长期休息的人的好处。

action.name: Teleport
entries: 阿斯莫德会神奇地传送，连同它所穿戴和携带的任何装备，最远可传送到它所看到的无人空间。

legendary.name: Chill Gaze
entries: 阿斯莫德使用他的寒冰凝视。

legendary.name: Command Submissive
entries: 阿斯莫德的目标是他能看到的60英尺范围内的一个正在跪拜和鞠躬的生物。目标使用它的反应来移动到它的一半速度，并对阿斯莫德选择的一个他能看到的生物进行一次武器攻击。

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: 阿斯莫德使用他的传送行动。

legendary.name: Ruby Rod (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 阿斯莫德用他的红宝石棒攻击。

legendary.name: Master Strategist (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 为Asmodeus掷出{@dice d10}。根据阿斯莫德的选择，在下一分钟内对阿斯莫德或他选择的盟友进行的攻击卷或对阿斯莫德进行的救赎卷中，会减去骰子上的数字。另外，如果阿斯莫德选择的话，他也可以将掷出的数字加入到下一分钟内的下一次能力检查、攻击卷或自救卷中。阿斯莫德一次最多可以保留3个策略大师的死亡。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 1-4 Actions)
entries: 阿斯莫德消耗一个法术槽来施放他所准备的一级、二级、三级或四级的法术。这样做每一级的法术要花费1个传奇行动。

legendary.name: Summon Pit Fiend (Costs 4 Actions)
entries: 阿斯莫德用魔法召唤出一个坑道恶魔。这个恶魔出现在阿斯莫德60英尺范围内的一个无人空间，作为阿斯莫德的盟友，如果它有这种能力，可以召唤其他恶魔。这个恶魔会一直存在，直到阿斯莫德死亡或他以行动方式将其解散。

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 驱散者的法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%））。他可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: 在Dispater周围20英尺范围内的生物，必须成功地进行一次{@dc 24}的智慧救赎，除非Dispater是{@condition incapacitated}。如果救赎失败，该生物就会变成{@condition frightened}，直到其下一回合开始。如果生物的救赎成功，该生物在接下来的24小时内将免疫于驱散者的恐惧光环。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果Dispater的拯救动作失败，他可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 驱散者在面对法术和其他魔法效果时有优势。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Dispater的武器攻击是有魔力的。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 驱散者在他的回合开始时重新获得20点命中率。如果他受到辐射伤害，这个特质在其下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。驱散者只有在其回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会死亡。

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: 任何由金属制成的非魔法武器在击中Dispater后会被腐蚀。在造成伤害后，该武器的伤害卷会受到一个永久的、累积的-1惩罚。如果它的惩罚下降到-5，武器就会被摧毁。当一个生物用金属制成的魔法武器击中Dispater并造成伤害时，它必须在{@dc 24}的智慧救赎中成功，并有优势。如果救赎失败，该武器在伤害卷上会受到一个永久的、累积的-1惩罚。如果它的惩罚下降到-5，武器就会被摧毁。
由金属制成的弹药如果击中Dispater，在造成伤害后会被摧毁。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 驱散者进行两次重锤攻击。他可以使用 "铁之触 "或 "锈之触 "来代替其中一次攻击。

action.name: Heavy Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8})重击伤害加上13 ({@damage 3d8})力量伤害。

action.name: Iron Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8})的穿刺伤害，目标必须在{@dc 24}宪法救赎中成功对抗被魔法变成铁。如果救赎失败，该生物开始变成铁，并且是{@condition restrained}。它必须在下一回合结束时重复这个蓄力动作。成功时，效果结束。如果失败，该生物将在24小时内变成铁。

action.name: Rusting Touch
entries: 驱散者会腐蚀它所看到的5英尺范围内的铁质金属物体。如果该物体没有被穿戴或携带，触摸会破坏其1英尺范围内的立方体。如果该物体是由生物佩戴或携带的，该生物可以做一个{@dc 24}灵巧反射来避免Dispater的触摸。如果该物体有魔力，该生物在蓄力动作上有优势。
如果被触及的物体是金属盔甲或正在穿戴或携带的金属盾牌，其提供的攻击力将受到永久和累积的-1惩罚。盔甲降低到10的AC值或盾牌下降到+0的奖励，就会被摧毁。如果被触及的物体是持有的金属武器，它就会像锈蚀金属特性中描述的那样生锈。

action.name: Deadly Secrets {@recharge 5}
entries: 驱散者选择一个它能看到的60英尺内的生物。每个在驱散者60英尺范围内并能听到驱散者的盟友必须成功地进行{@dc 24}智慧救赎，否则它将受到18({@damage 4d8})的精神伤害，并且必须使用它的反应向目标移动，速度最多为它的一半，如果它在范围内，对它进行一次近战武器攻击。否则，它必须对目标进行一次远程武器攻击或远程法术攻击。拯救成功后，生物会受到一半的伤害。建筑物和亡灵对这个效果免疫。

action.name: Teleport
entries: 驱散者会神奇地将它和它所穿戴和携带的任何设备一起传送到它所看到的无人的空间，最远可达120英尺。

reaction.name: Vexing Escape {@recharge 5}
entries: 当Dispater受到伤害时，他将该伤害降为0，并将其传送到它能看到的未被占用的空间，最远可达120英尺。

legendary.name: Dispater's Touch
entries: Dispater使用 "铁之触 "或 "锈之触"。

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: 驱散者使用他的传送行动。

legendary.name: Enemy Insight (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 驱散者在他60英尺范围内选择一个它能看到的目标。直到Dispater的下一个回合结束，Dispater在他对目标的下一次攻击卷和蓄力投掷中具有优势。此外，目标在下一次攻击卷和蓄力投掷中对派遣者有劣势。

legendary.name: Heavy Mace (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 驱魔人进行了一次重锤攻击。

legendary.name: Raise Barrier (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 分散器施放{@spell blade barrier}、{@spell cloud of daggers}或{@spell wall of iron|MonsterManualExpanded2}。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 梅菲斯特的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%））。他可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 梅菲斯特是一个20级的施法者。他的法术能力是智力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率（%1%）），他只需要语言成分来施法。他准备了以下的巫师法术。

trait.name: Hellfire Aura
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，梅菲斯特可以发出一个恶魔之火的光环，出现在黑暗灼热的火焰中。在梅菲斯特身边10英尺范围内的生物开始其回合，或者在他身边10英尺范围内触及他或用近战攻击击中他，并且地狱之火光环处于激活状态，会受到11（（%0%））的火焰伤害。
受到地狱火光环伤害的生物会变得容易受到火焰伤害，直到其下一回合开始。地狱火光环会一直存在，直到梅菲斯特死亡或他以行动方式解除它为止。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果梅菲斯特失败了，他可以选择成功。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Mephistopheles对法术和其他魔法效果的拯救动作有优势。

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: 梅菲斯特的武器攻击是神奇的。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 梅菲斯特在他的回合开始时恢复20点生命值。如果他受到辐射伤害，这个特性在他的下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。梅菲斯特只有在他的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会死亡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 梅菲斯特做了两次ranseur攻击。

action.name: Ranseur
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}16({@damage 2d10 + 5})的穿刺伤害加上11({@damage 2d10})的火焰伤害，并且该生物容易受到火焰伤害，直到梅菲斯特的下一回合结束。

action.name: Hellfire Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: 梅菲斯特的眼睛在5英尺宽的120英尺范围内投射强烈的火热能量。这条线上的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 23}灵巧的蓄力动作，如果蓄力失败会受到29({@damage 6d6 + 8})的火焰伤害，如果蓄力成功则会受到一半的伤害。如果这个伤害使目标的命中率降至0，它就会被瓦解。被瓦解的生物和它所穿戴和携带的一切，除了魔法物品，都会变成一堆细小的灰烬和熔渣。该生物只能通过真正的复活或愿望法术来恢复生命。

action.name: Word of Injunction (1/Day)
entries: 梅菲斯特说出一个可怕的力量之语，可以迫使它所看到的60英尺范围内的一个生物立即死亡，或者被一波又一波的强烈痛苦所袭击。该生物必须事先与梅菲斯特签订了具有法律约束力的契约。否则，它没有任何效果。
如果目标有150点或更少的命中率，Mephistopheles可以选择将其命中率降为0，并将其尸体化为灰烬。否则，梅菲斯特可以使目标受到残缺的痛苦的影响，它的任何速度都不能高于10英尺。目标在攻击卷轴、能力检查和蓄力投掷方面也有劣势，除了宪法蓄力投掷之外。最后，如果目标试图施放一个法术，它必须首先在体质救赎上获得成功，否则施法失败，法术就会被浪费掉。
遭受这种痛苦的目标可以在其每个回合结束时做一个{@dc 24}宪法救赎动作。拯救成功后，疼痛结束。

action.name: Teleport
entries: 梅菲斯特会神奇地将他和他所穿戴和携带的任何装备一起传送到它所能看到的未被占用的空间，最远可达120英尺。

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: 梅菲斯特使用他的传送行动。

legendary.name: Ranseur (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: 梅菲斯特做了一次ranseur攻击。

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 1-3 Actions)
entries: 梅菲斯特花费一个法术槽来施放他所准备的一级、二级或三级的法术。这样做每一级的法术要花费1个传奇行动。

legendary.name: Summon Ice Devil (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 梅菲斯特用魔法召唤出一个冰魔。这个魔鬼出现在梅菲斯特60英尺范围内的一个无人空间，作为梅菲斯特的盟友，如果它有这样的能力，可以召唤其他魔鬼。这个恶魔会一直存在，直到梅菲斯特死亡或者他以行动的方式将其解除。

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 阿斯莫德的法术能力是魅力（法术保存（%0%），法术攻击命中率（%1%））。它可以天生施展以下法术，不需要任何物质成分。
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 阿斯莫德的方面是一个13级的施法者。它的法术能力是智慧（法术救赎（%0%），法术攻击命中率（%1%）），它只需要语言成分来施法。它准备了以下的牧师法术。

trait.name: Aura of Submission
entries: 当阿斯莫德神像挥舞着红宝石棒时，在阿斯莫德神像20英尺范围内的生物必须成功地进行智慧救赎，除非阿斯莫德神像是（%1%）。如果救赎失败，该生物必须在阿斯莫德之神面前下跪和鞠躬，直到其下一回合开始。在这种跪拜和鞠躬结束之前，目标不能采取任何行动或反应，其速度为0且不能增加。如果一个生物的救赎成功，该生物在接下来的24小时内对阿斯莫德的服从光环免疫。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: 如果阿斯莫德的一面在救赎中失败，它可以选择成功。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 阿斯莫德之神在其回合开始时恢复10点生命值。如果它受到寒冷或辐射伤害，这个特性在它下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。只有当阿斯莫德之像在其回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会死亡。

trait.name: Swift Caster
entries: 在挥舞红宝石棒时，阿斯莫德的一面可以使用一个额外的行动来施展一个施法时间为一个行动的法术。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿斯莫德的一面用它的红宝石棒攻击两次，并使用它的寒意凝视。

action.name: Ruby Rod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})重击伤害加上4 ({@damage 1d8})坏死伤害。如果目标是生物，它必须做一个{@dc 20}智慧救赎动作。如果救赎失败，该生物必须在阿斯莫德之神面前下跪和鞠躬，直到下一回合开始。在这种跪拜和鞠躬结束之前，目标不能采取任何行动或反应，其速度为0且不能增加。

action.name: Chill Gaze
entries: 阿斯莫德之神将其神奇的目光转向它所看到的60英尺内的一个生物。目标必须在一个{@dc 18}体质救赎中成功。如果救赎失败，该生物会受到16({@damage 3d6 + 6})的寒冷伤害，不能使用反应，其速度减半，并且在其回合内不能进行一次以上的攻击。此外，该生物在其回合中可以使用一个行动或一个额外行动，但不能同时使用。这些效果持续到Asmodeus的下一回合结束。拯救成功后，目标会受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Teleport (Recharges 5/6)
entries: 阿斯莫德的一面会神奇地传送，连同它所穿戴和携带的任何装备，最多可以传送到它所看到的无人空间的60英尺。

legendary.name: Chill Gaze
entries: 阿斯莫德之神使用它的寒意凝视。

legendary.name: Command Submissive
entries: 阿斯莫德的一面以它能看到的60英尺范围内的一个生物（%0%）为目标。目标使用它的反应来移动到它的一半速度，并对它能看到的Asmodeus的pect of Asmodeus所选择的生物做一次武器攻击。

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Asmodeus uses its Teleport action, if available.

legendary.name: Ruby Rod (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Asmodeus attacks with its Ruby Rod.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 1-4 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Asmodeus expends a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, 3rd-level, or 4th-level spell that it has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Bael's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing its appearance)

trait.name: Dreadful
entries: The Aspect of Bael can use a bonus action to appear dreadful until the start of his next turn. Each creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Aspect of Bael must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Bael fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Aspect of Bael regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Aspect of Bael dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Bael makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Hellish Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Bael magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Awaken Greed
entries: The Aspect of Bael casts charm person or major image.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Bael uses its Teleport action, if available.

legendary.name: Attack (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Bael attacks once with its hellish morningstar.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Bel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the Aspect of Bel must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, unless the Aspect of Bel is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the Aspect of Bel's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Bel fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Bel makes two attacks: one with its greatsword and one with its tail.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that is not being held or worn, it catches fire.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Bel magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Aspect of Bel moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Bel uses its Teleport action, if available.

legendary.name: Attack (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Bel attacks once with its greatsword.

legendary.name: Fireball (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Bel casts fireball.

legendary.name: Tactical Edge (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: Roll a {@dice d6} for the Aspect of Bel. The number rolled on the die is subtracted from the next attack roll made against the Aspect of Bel or an ally of its choice within the next minute

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Dispater's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing its appearance)

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the Aspect of Dispater must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw, unless the Aspect of Dispater is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the Aspect of Dispater's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Dispater fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Aspect of Dispater regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Aspect of Dispater dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rust Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the Aspect of Dispater corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed.
Ammunition made of metal that hits the Aspect of Dispater is destroyed after dealing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Dispater makes two heavy mace attacks. He can use Iron Touch or Rusting Touch in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Heavy Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

action.name: Iron Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw against being magically turned into iron. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to iron and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is turned into iron for 1 hour.

action.name: Rusting Touch
entries: The Aspect of Dispater corrodes nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it. If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw to avoid the Aspect of Dispater's touch.

If the object touched is either nonmagical metal armor or a nonmagical metal shield being worn or carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held nonmagical metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.

action.name: Deadly Secrets {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Dispater chooses one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. Each ally of the target within 60 feet of the Aspect of Dispater and can hear the Aspect of Dispater must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage and must use its reaction to move up to half its speed towards the target and if it is within range, make one melee weapon attack against it. Otherwise, it must make a ranged weapon attack or ranged spell attack against the target. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Dispater magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Aspect of Dispater makes a heavy mace attack.

legendary.name: Dispater's Touch
entries: The Aspect of Dispater uses Iron Touch or Rusting Touch.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Dispater uses its Teleport action, if available.

legendary.name: Enemy Insight (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Dispater chooses one target it can see within 60 feet of it. Until the end of the Aspect of Dispater's next turn, The Aspect of Dispater has advantage on the next attack roll and saving throw it makes against the target. In addition, the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll and saving throw it makes against the Aspect of Dispater.

legendary.name: Raise Barrier (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Dispater casts {@spell cloud of daggers} or {@spell wall of iron|MonsterManualExpanded2}.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Geryon's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing its appearance)

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Geryon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Aspect of Geryon regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Aspect of Geryon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Geryon makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its stinger.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 17}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The Aspect of Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already {@condition grappled} by the Aspect of Geryon, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage it takes. If its hit point maximum drops to 0, it dies. This reduction lasts until the {@condition poisoned} condition is removed.

action.name: Sound the Horn (1/Day)
entries: The Aspect of Geryon blows its horn, which causes {@dice 1d3 + 1} minotaurs to appear in unoccupied spaces of his choice within 60 feet of it and act as its allies. The minotaurs roll initiative when they appear. They remain until they die or the Aspect of Geryon uses an action to dismiss any or all of them.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Geryon magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Infernal Glare
entries: The Aspect of Geryon targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see Aspect of Geryon, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the Aspect of Geryon until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Geryon uses its Teleport action, if available.

legendary.name: Swift Sting (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Geryon attacks with its stinger

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing its appearance)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks) and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Hellfire Aura
entries: As a bonus action, the Aspect of Mephistopheles can emit an aura of diabolic fire appearing swathed in dark searing flames. A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Aspect of Mephistopheles, or touches it or hits it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it and the Hellfire Aura is active takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. A creature that takes damage from the Hellfire Aura becomes vulnerable to fire damage until the start of its next turn. The Hellfire Aura remains until the Aspect of Mephistopheles dies or until he dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Mephistopheles fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles regains 10 hit points  at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Aspect of Mephistopheles dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles makes two ranseur attacks.

action.name: Ranseur
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and the creature is vulnerable to fire until the end of the Aspect of Mephistopheles's next turn.

action.name: Hellfire Gaze (1/Day)
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles's eyes project intense fery energy in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated. A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine ash and slag. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a true resurrection or a wish spell.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles makes one ranseur attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles uses its Teleport action, if available

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 1-3 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Mephistopheles expends a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, or 3rd-level spell that he has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Moloch's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing its appearance)

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Moloch fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Aspect of Moloch regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Aspect of Moloch dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Moloch makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, and one with its whip.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Many-Tailed Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet in a straight line toward Aspect of Moloch.

action.name: Breath of Despair {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage, drop whatever it is holding, and become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the Aspect of Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to the Aspect of Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Moloch magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Moloch uses its Teleport action.

legendary.name: Whip
entries: The Aspect of Moloch makes one attack with its whip.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Moloch casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The Aspect can innately cast Divine Word (spell save {@dc 19}). Its spellcasting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: If the Aspect has at least 1 hit point, it regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The Aspect can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one reaction per round. It also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked {@condition unconscious}. If it fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of its unspent legendary actions is spent.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the Aspect's choice that is within 120 feet of the Aspect and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the the Aspect's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

legendary.name: Black Dragon Head (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Green Dragon Head (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect exhales poisonous gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Blue Dragon Head (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Red Dragon Head (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 9d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: White Dragon Head (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Aspect of Zariel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
will: {@spell alter self} (can become Medium when changing its appearance)

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the Aspect of Zariel's darkvision.

trait.name: Fiery Weapons
entries: The Aspect of Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Aspect of Zariel fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Aspect of Zariel regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Aspect of Zariel dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aspect of Zariel attacks twice with its longsword or with its javelins. It can substitute Horrid Touch for one of these attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} + {@hit 10} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Horrid Touch {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} + {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target is also {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The Aspect of Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The Aspect of Zariel moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The Aspect of Zariel uses its Teleport action, if available.

legendary.name: Immolating Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Aspect of Zariel turns its magical gaze toward one creature it can see within 120 feet of it and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The destrachan can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The destrachan has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The destrachan makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Destructive Harmonics {@recharge 4}
entries: The destrachan emits thunder energy in a 30-foot cone. It can choose one from the following three effects:
Rupture. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
Stun. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
Shatter. Each non-magical object that isn't worn in that area takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) thunder damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The destrachan pack lord can't use its blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The destrachan pack lord has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the destrachan's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied destrachan that starts its turn within 30 feet of the destrachan pack lord and can hear the destrachan pack lord gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn, provided the destrachan pack lord isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The destrachan pack lord has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The destrachan pack lord makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Destructive Harmonics {@recharge 4}
entries: The destrachan pack lord emits thunder energy in a 60-foot cone. It can choose one from the following three effects:
Rupture. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
Stun. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.
Shatter. Each non-magical object that isn't worn in that area takes 54 ({@damage 12d8}) thunder damage.

trait.name: Pack Frenzy
entries: While it can see two allied creatures within 30 feet of it, the dire corby gains advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed}, and all melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks rolls against it have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dire corby makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Pack Frenzy
entries: While it can see two allied creatures within 30 feet of it, the dire corby alpha gains advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed}, and all melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks rolls against it have advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dire corby alpha makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its claws. It can use its Doom Shriek in place of its beak attack.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Doom Shriek
entries: The dire corby alpha emits a horrifying shriek. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the dire corby alpha and able to hear it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the dire corby alpha's next turn. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the dire corby's Doom Shriek for 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The draegloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). The draegloth can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the draegloth to sleep.

trait.name: Tethering Web
entries: As a bonus action, the draegloth can pull a target {@condition restrained} by its web into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the draegloth.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The creature is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 17} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The draegloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The draegloth can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: The draegloth has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the draegloth to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its biteand two with its claws. Alternatively, it can make two attacks with its claws and cast one spell.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dracolisk can breath air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
entries: If the dracolisk fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 60 feet of the dracolisk and the two of them can see each other, the dracolisk can force the creature to make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw if the dracolisk isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the dracolisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert it s eyes again. If it looks at the dracolisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the dracolisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dracolisk can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolisk's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dracolisk exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 58 ({@damage 13d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dracolisk makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dracolisk makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dracolisk beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolisk must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dracolisk can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dracolisk can breath air and water.

entries: The blackspawn stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Stealthy

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the blackspawn stalker knows the exact location of any creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The blackspawn stalker ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The blackspawn stalker deals an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blackspawn stalker makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tails.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Web Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The blackspawn stalker spits webbing in a line that is 30 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage and be {@condition restrained} by webbing. A creature that starts its turn {@condition restrained} takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 15} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The blackspawn crawler has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if the blackspawn crawler isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The blackspawn crawler exhales acid in a 30-feet long that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries: The whitespawn iceskidder exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The drake has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Slowing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The drake exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

trait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: The drake rolls one additional weapon damage die when determining extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The drake has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the drake moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the drake can enter a rage at the start of its turn. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the drake is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, the drake gains the following benefits:
• The drake has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
• When it makes a melee weapon attack, the drake gains a +2 bonus to the damage roll.
• The drake has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can use Worry in place of its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage or 17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage while raging. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the drake can't use its bite on another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage or 11 ({@damage 1d6 + 8}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Worry
entries: A creature the drake is grappling must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the drake's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The drake has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Perfect Climber
entries: The drake has advantage on Strength ({@skill Athletics}) checks made while climbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The drake exhales gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, its armor also takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The duergar is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following artifcer spells prepared:

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Arcane Turret (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The duergar magically summons a Medium turret in an unoccupied space on a horizontal surface within 5 feet of it. The turret is a magical object that occupies its space and that has crablike legs. It has an AC of 18 and 60 hit points. It is immune to poison damage, psychic damage, and all conditions. If it is forced to make an ability check or a saving throw, treat all its ability scores as 10 (+0). If the mending spell is cast on it, it regains {@dice 2d6} hit points. It disappears if it is reduced to 0 hit points or after 10 minutes. The duergar can dismiss it early as an action.
When the duergar summons the turret, it decides which type it is, choosing from the options listed below:

Flamethrower. The turret exhales fire in an adjacent 15-foot cone that you designate. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

Force Ballista. Make a ranged spell attack, originating from the turret, at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away from the turret.
Defender. The turret emits a burst of positive energy that grants itself and each creature of your choice within 10 feet of it {@dice 1d8 + 3} temporary hit points.

On each of its turns, the duergar can take a bonus action to cause the turret to activate if it is within 60 feet of it. As part of the same action, the duergar can direct the turret to walk or climb up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space.

The duergar can use an action to command the turret to detonate if is within 60 feet of it. Doing so destroys the turret and forces each creature within 10 feet of it to make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw,  taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage on a failed save or half as muchdamage on a successful one.

action.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The duergar magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The duergar is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following artifcer spells prepared:

trait.name: Battle Ready
entries: The duergar uses its Intelligence modifer, instead of its Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls when attacking with a weapon (included in the attacks).

trait.name: Command Iron Defender
entries: As a bonus action, the duergar targets the iron defender it summoned and it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the duergar, the target can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack, or take the Dash, Disengage, Help, or Repair action.

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. Maul. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage while enlarged.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The duergar magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

action.name: Summon Iron Defender (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The duergar summons its mechanical companion. In combat, the iron defender shares the duergar's initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after the duergar. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is the Dodge action, unless the duergar used Command Iron Defender this turn.

monster.name: Iron Defender (Spider Form)
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The iron defender can climb diffcult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The iron defender can't be surprised.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft.. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Repair (3/Day)
entries: The magical mechanisms inside the iron defender restore {@dice 2d8 + 2} hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reaction.name: Defensive Pounce
entries: The iron defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the iron defender.

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Quick Loader
entries: The duergar ignores the loading quality of crossbows.

trait.name: Sharpshooter
entries: The duergar's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover and attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the duergar's ranged weapon attack rolls.

trait.name: Steady Aim (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the duergar takes careful aim at a creature it can see within range of its ranged weapon. Until the end of its turn, the duergar deals an an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage with its ranged weapon attack against the target.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Shortsword
